- Bumping Serve Up to 9.2.0 Broke Calls to Serve's API ([#6598](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/issues/6598)) ([ce9c3a8](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/commit/ce9c3a8))
